## Variables

<table><thead><tr><th>

Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[NULL\_HASH](./api.null_hash.md)


</td><td>

The null hash is used in case a WAL is to address a DNA only, not specific DHT content. It starts with the prefix of an EntryHash, followed by zeroes


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
